customer_name: Capital of Texas Zoo L L C
customer_addr:

site_name: Capital of Texas Zoo L L C

citations.narrative:
The ride side of the fence line of the bull camel enclosure is leaning and supported by small wooden posts. The fence is
less than chest high on the camel. A board has pulled off the support post and the fence is bent in one section of the front
fence line of this enclosure. The fence wire in this enclosure is welded wire which can be bent by an animal as strong as a
bull camel. The right side of the fence is along a caretaker access path and there is concern the bull camel could easily
reach a person walking by. Bull camels are extremely strong and can become dangerous . The fence line of this
enclosure is low ,leaning and is not made of materials that are structurally strong enough to safely contain the camel and
protect the camel or people working close by the enclosure from injury . The camel enclosure must be repaired or
replaced with materials that are of such strength and appropriate for a bull camel and must be maintained in good repair
to protect the animals from injury and contain the animals.
CORRECT BY : 6/11/2023
This focused inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee.
n
